name: Ant Detective
description:
Kowalski is fresh out of ant rehab and ready to tackle the colony’s dirty criminal underbelly. Journey with him into the twisted maze of the Anti-Royalist agenda as he searches for reason behind the death of a public servant, in a classic noir setting. Was it murder? Could it be something worse?

Mother provides.

Ant Detective was originally made for Ludum Dare 38 and everything in it was made by us. It also recently won the Dreamhack Jungle competition.

If you would like to see a full version of Ant Detective made then please go to http://motherprovides.com/ to sign up and wishlist t show support.
